items.name: Subject_Title
items.label: عنوان موضوع
items.sql:
SELECT Subject_Title
FROM PMT_TB110006
WHERE IsActive = 1
 and SUBJECT_CLASS_CODE = 'SC0098'
 and Subject_Code = "@#Subject_Code"

options.label: ادامه فرآيند (بدون نياز به تصديق اطلاعات)

items.name: Subject_Temp
items.label: ايجاد / اصلاح قالب موضوع
items.sql:
SELECT Subject_Temp
FROM PMT_TB120022
WHERE IsActive = 1
 and Subject_Code = '@#Subject_Code'
